original_text: That happened because of the wicked things that the people did in those places. They offered sacrifices to other gods. They worshipped gods that they never knew before. You and your ancestors did not know those gods either. That made me very angry.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 자기나 너희나 너희 조상들이 알지 못하는 다른 신들에게 나아가 분향하여 섬겨서 나의 노여움을 일으킨 악행으로 말미암음이라

sentences.original_text: That happened because of the wicked things
that the people did in those places
They offered sacrifices to other gods
They worshipped gods that they never knew before
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이전에 결코 알지 못했던 신들을 숭배했습니다

sentences.original_text: You and your ancestors did not know those gods either
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과 당신의 조상들도 그 신들을 알지 못했습니다
